r.d: The PEAR package contains: * the PEAR base class * the PEAR_Error error handling mechanism * the PEAR installer, for creating, distributing and installing packages
r.n:
* PEAR_Error class has call backtrace available by calling getBacktrace(). Available if used with PHP 4.3 or newer.
* PEAR_Config class uses getenv() rather than $_ENV to read environment variables.
* System::which() Windows fix, now looks for exe/bat/cmd/com suffixes rather than just exe
* Added "pear cvsdiff" command
* Windows output buffering bugfix for "pear" command
